taxon_notes: Pinus pendula is neither a common nor accepted name. Pinus pendula Griff. is a synonym for  Picea smithiana (Wall.) Boiss.

restoration: NOTE this can become an invasive under certain circumstances, and should probably not be encouraged.
taxon_notes: It appears from iNaturalist and other resources (e.g., https://phytokeys.pensoft.net/article/49602/ and doi:10.1007/s11676-018-0621-x) that Casuarina equisetifolia is the most common Casuarina in East Africa.
